FollowPatrolPath.Description: Whether this NPC will follow patrol paths at all.

Patrol.Description: Whether or not this NPC will patrol during its waking hours, either alone or as part of a group.

NameTranslationKey.Description: Translation key for NPC name display

DesiredAttackDistanceRange.Description: The distance within which the NPC wants to be from its target while attacking. The max value should be lower than AttackDistance.
